original: Andersson, Gustaf Daniel, läroverksadjunkt, Skara, f. 22/11/08 i Troililhättan av Karl’ A. o. Emma Johansson. G. 43 m. teckn:lär:an Greta Kastrup. Barn: Margareta f. 44. — Stud:ex. i Vänersborg 26, fil. kand. i Upps. 30, fil. mag. 33, provår v. Vasa h. a. 1. i Gbg 39. Timlär. v. Katrineholms ensk. lärov. vt. 35, vik. v. Gbgs östra realsk. o. h. folksk. periodvis ht. 35, vik. samt e. adj. i Luleå 36-38, e. adj. i Lund 40-41, v. Östra real i Sthlbi 41-43, e. o. adj. i Karlskrona 43-46, i Borås 46-47, adj. v. Skara h. a. d. fr. 47 m. tjg. t, v. i Borås, därjämte div. förordn. som timdär. i Troilihättan, Gbg, Sthlm, Karlskrona o. Borås. Styr:ik’d. i tsydsv. krets, av Sv:es e :lär :fören. 40-41.
translated: Andersson, Gustaf Daniel, high school teacher, Skara, born on November 22nd, 1908 in Trollhättan to Karl A. and Emma Johansson. Married in 1943 to Greta Kastrup, a drawing teacher. They had one child, Margareta, born in 1944. He completed his high school education in Vänersborg in 1926 and obtained a Bachelor's degree in Uppsala in 1930, followed by a Master's degree in 1933. He completed his teaching internship at Vasa h. a. 1. in Gothenburg in 1939. He worked as a substitute teacher at Katrineholm's private school in the spring of 1935, as well as a substitute and later a permanent teacher at Gothenburg's eastern high school and primary school intermittently during the autumn of 1935 and later. He worked as a permanent teacher in Luleå from 1936-1938, in Lund from 1940-1941, at Östra real in Stockholm from 1941-1943, and as a temporary teacher in Karlskrona from 1943-1946 and in Borås from 1946-1947. In 1947, he became a permanent teacher at Skara h. a. d. In addition to his permanent positions, he also worked as a substitute teacher in Trollhättan, Gothenburg, Stockholm, Karlskrona, and Borås, and received various appointments as a hourly teacher. He served as a board member of the Swedish National Teachers' Association in the southern district from 1940-1941.
